introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is Flux1 Krea?
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: Flux1 Krea is an all-in-one AI toolkit designed for creators. From real-time image generation to AI-powered upscaling and animation, we provide the tools to bring your creative vision to life effortlessly.

items.title: Real-time Generation
items.description: Instantly see your image evolve as you type your prompt and adjust settings.

items.title: Enhance & Upscale
items.description: Transform low-resolution images into stunning HD masterpieces with a single click.

items.title: AI Animation
items.description: Bring your static images to life with powerful, easy-to-use animation capabilities.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why Choose Flux1 Krea?
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: Get everything you need to create professional-grade visuals, whether you're a designer, marketer, or artist.

items.title: Unleash Your Creativity
items.description: Our intuitive interface and powerful real-time engine remove all barriers, letting your ideas flow freely.

items.title: Professional Quality, Effortlessly
items.description: Generate high-resolution, commercially-ready visuals, from logos and patterns to photorealistic scenes.

items.title: Train Your Own AI
items.description: Train a personalized AI on your images and style to create truly unique and consistent artwork.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Create with Flux1 Krea
usage.description: Bring your vision to life in four simple steps:

items.title: 1. Describe Your Vision
items.description: Write a detailed prompt or upload a starting image to guide the AI.

items.title: 2. Refine in Real-time
items.description: Adjust the AI strength, style, and other parameters to perfect your image instantly.

items.title: 3. Enhance & Upscale
items.description: Use our tools to add fine details and increase the resolution for a flawless finish.

items.title: 4. Download & Share
items.description: Download your high-quality creation and share your masterpiece with the world.

items.title: Animation & Video Creation

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us on Discord or by email.

items.title: What is Flux1 Krea Image Generator?
items.description: Flux1 Krea is a comprehensive AI creative suite that allows you to generate images from text prompts in real-time, enhance and upscale your pictures, train your own custom AI models, and even animate your creations.

items.title: How does the real-time generation work?
items.description: Our advanced AI model is optimized to process your input and render image updates instantly. As you type or adjust a setting, the AI generates a new version of the image on the fly, giving you immediate visual feedback.

items.title: Can I use the generated images commercially?
items.description: Yes, on our paid plans, you retain full ownership of the images you create and can use them for any commercial purpose without any restrictions.

items.title: What is AI training and how does it work?
items.description: AI training allows you to create a personalized model by uploading a set of your own images. The AI learns your specific style, subjects, or aesthetics, enabling you to generate new, unique images that are consistent with your brand or artistic vision.

items.title: What file formats can I download?
items.description: You can download your creations in high-quality formats such as PNG and JPG. For animations, you can export them as MP4 or GIF files.

items.title: Do you offer a free trial or plan?
items.description: Yes, we offer a free plan with a generous number of credits so you can explore the core features of Flux1 Krea. For unlimited access and advanced features like AI training and high-resolution upscaling, you can upgrade to one of our premium plans.
